title: "TT Ranked Flex will be enabled on Thursday during the hours of 03:00 PM to 01:00 AM AEDT"
body: Please for the love of god as a community we need to band together and queue for this every thursday else we see twisted treeline go the way of dominion.

replies.body: Add me lads my mates are too lane to play TT. Lazy fuckers they are.
I have got a group of friends ready to play. :)
Not with you though because your a whiney toxic brat :)

Only toxic if you earn the toxic.

if you dont play like a potato thats taken one too many nukes to the brain i dont toxic.

like there is a middle ground man, i can be a good person and still hate people who cant grasp basic concepts.

this isnt black and white.

Everyone rally their friends!
This is probably our only chance!

The OCE server VS Riot!
we must prevail!
